Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at Western/14th
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Western, Cermak, Marshall and Ogden due to street blockage near Western/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 18th, Western, Cermak, Marshall and Ogden, due to street blockage near Western/14th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western, #X49 Western Express Temporary Reroute at Western/14th
ShortDescription: 49 Western, X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 18th, Damen, Roosevelt and Western due to street blockage near Western/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western, #X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, 18th, Damen, Roosevelt and Western, due to street blockage near Western/14th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Jackson/Ashland
ShortDescription: Updated: WB 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Racine, Madison, Ashland and Van Buren due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Racine, Madison, Ashland and Van Buren due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Loomis
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Ashland, Taylor, Racine and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via  Harrison, Ashland, Taylor, Racine and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Loomis.

Allow extra travel time.
